Package com.udeyrishi.pipe

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CountedBarrierController
    This barrier controller models the textbook Barrier for jobs.
    ManualBarrierController
    A simple barrier controller that lifts the barrier when ManualBarrierController.lift is called.
    Pipeline<T>
    A pipeline is a sequence of steps (and barriers, optionally) used to convert an input to an output.
    PipelineDispatcher
    Represents a dispatcher that will be used to start all pipe coroutines. This dispatcher is converted into an effective kotlin.coroutines.CoroutineContext by joining the PipelineDispatcher.getCoroutineDispatcher and the PipelineDispatcher.onInternalPipeError implementation.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Job<T>
    Represents a chunk of work that is being processed in a pipeline. When an item gets pushed into a pipeline, the pipeline returns a class Job to track its progress.
    PipelineBuilder<T>
    A builder class for constructing pipelines.
    PipelineDispatcherKt  
    PipelineKt  
    State
    Represents the state machine that all pipe jobs follow.
    Step
